BBC News - Merkel says German multicultural society has failed
 
 Merkel has declared multiculturalism "dead" in Germany.
 Supposedly this is to do with Turkish immigration, though as with the rest of the EU the major source of immigration would be other EU countries.
 She's declared that People looking to live in Germany should have to speak German and that German people should be the 'focus' of German policies.
 Mr Seehoffer stated that "German culture should be dominant"...

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Merkel on Multiculturalism
